summary: I RECEIVED A SAFETY RECALL NOTIFICATION DEC 2013 LETTING ME KNOW I NEEDED TO CONTACT A DODGE DEALER STARTING 1.6.14 TO SCHEDULE A SERVICE APPOINTMENT FOR THE REPAIR.    RECALL IS FOR THE LEFT TIE ROD BALL STUD WHICH MAY FRACTURE AND CAUSE A LOSS OF DIRECTIONAL CONTROL AND OR CRASH WITHOUT WARNING.  1.6.14 I EMAILED THE DODGE DEALER IN CARSON CITY, NV  1.7.14 I CALLED THE DODGE DEALER IN CARSON CITY, NV AND WAS TOLD I WAS NUMBER 60 IN A LINE FOR THIS RECALL AND NO PARTS HAVE ARRIVED TO DATE.  1.7.14 I CALLED THE CHRYSLER GROUP RECALL ASSISTANCE CENTER AND WAS TOLD NO PARTS HAVE SHIPPED YET AND THERE IS NO TIMELINE SET FOR GETTING PARTS TO DEALERS.  1.24.14 I LEFT A MESSAGE AT THE DODGE DEALER IN CARSON CITY, NV.  MY CALL WAS RETURNED AND I WAS TOLD NO PARTS HAVE ARRIVED YET AND I AM STILL NUMBER 60 IN LINE FOR THE REPAIR.      OBVIOUSLY, I AM CONCERNED ABOUT THE POTENTIAL FOR A LOSS OF DIRECTIONAL CONTROL.  I AM LOOKING AT GETTING ASSISTANCE ON HOW WE CAN HELP DODGE SPEED UP THE RECALL REPAIR PROCESS.  *TR
